entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.5°C
entry.summary:

Dewpoint: 4.2°C

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers or drizzle early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High 12. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the morning. Showers beginning in the afternoon. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence late in the morning and in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Monday 17 April 2023
